mapper.sql: s.sku_id, s.product_id, s.sku, s.colour,s.colour_number, s.size,s.weight,s.cost_price,s.head_trip_cost head_trip_cost,s.head_trip_cost_min, s.remark, s.create_time, s.create_by, s.update_time, s.update_by,s.second_sku, s.brand, s.product_name, s.material,s.grade, s.executive_standard, s.security_category, s.inspector, s.suggested_retail_price,s.development_level
mapper.select:
select s.* ,p.product_code,p.product_name productProductName,(select sum(ss.inventory_quantity) from shop_sku ss where ss.sku_id=s.sku_id) inventory_quantity from sku s left join product p on s.product_id=p.product_id
order by p.product_code,s.sku

select p.product_name productName,p.product_code productCode,s.sku, s.colour,s.colour_number colourNumber,s.size,s.weight, s.cost_price costPrice, s.head_trip_cost headTripCost, (select sum(ss.inventory_quantity) from shop_sku ss where ss.sku_id=s.sku_id) inventoryQuantity,s.remark from sku s left join product p on s.product_id=p.product_id
order by p.product_code,s.sku

select s.brand,s.second_sku secondSku,s.product_name productName,p.product_code productCode,s.material, s.grade, s.executive_standard executiveStandard,s.security_category securityCategory,s.inspector, s.suggested_retail_price suggestedRetailPrice,s.size,s.colour from sku s left join product p on s.product_id=p.product_id
and s.sku = #{sku} and s.second_sku =#{secondSku}
